website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech HD Webcam C310 installs quickly and easily, works seamlessly with video chat programs like Skype, Yahoo Messenger, and Google Chat, and even takes high-quality 5-megapixel snapshots for less money than its competitors. If you're in the market for an aftermarket Webcam, the Logitech HD Webcam C310 is your best bet.
pros: "RightSound" microphone feature boosts clarity and subdues ambient noise
cons: Video quality gets choppy at higher resolutions on slower systems
base doesn't pan left to right

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...but that isn't bad...not bad at all...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price for the service I bought it for. I am a virtual tutor and need a clear enough picture in order for me to meet requirements. It's pretty straight forward, no frills, but for the price I can't be mad. Installation was easy, went directly to the Logitech website where they automatically detected my version of Windows. This is the second Webcam I've ever owned and I have a MacAir. As you can see, the picture quality is very nice and I have horrible, dark apartment lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Clear Pic, Very Clear Microphone
customer_reviews.text: This video was made using my new Logitech Webcam C310. Excellent picture and sound quality. I am using the webcam's microphone to make calls on skype, and there has been no complaints on the receiving end.
customer_reviews.author: razorslug123

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Price, Classic Logitech Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these so I could video chat with my girlfriend in higher quality. After the purchase, I can say both of us are very happy with the upgrade over a built in webcam - the quality of the picture is very clear for a webcam, especially at this price point. Historically, I've also had some amazing experiences with Logitech customer services, so if anything happens to your web camera, I'd be surprised if Logitech didn't work to the best of its ability to resolve your problem. Below I've attached a sample photo I've taken with the webcam - judge the quality yourself
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you have Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems with Windows 10. When I was finally able to record video, there was tearing in the video. Spend the extra $22.33 (at time of writing) and treat yourself to the no hassle usage and great 1080p video on the C920. It has been held up as a golden standard across several years for good reason: it's awesome in every respect. As a more general gripe, Logitech needs to eliminate half their product line. Too many models with tiny differences.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have only used for Skype but I have been told by the people that I chat with that the image quality is very nice. The camera is a bit smaller than I was expecting. The way that it mounts is a bit awkward for a computer monitor. It worked right out of the box on Win 10 64bit with no need to install any software or drivers. I would not hesitate to buy again for another computer or for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Demeter

customer_reviews.title: Works with Linux and is plug-n-play in a USB 2 port.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a webcam that would work with Ubuntu 19.04, was plug-n-play, would work with a USB port, Didn't need any driver downloads, and was under $30. This one fit the bill. Check out the little video I made to show the output. It works with all my software. Cheese, OBS, etc. It works with Hangout, but I didn't try with any other online programs. I don't use them anyway. The audio and video work just fine. Hope this review helps you make up your mind to buy or not to buy.
customer_reviews.author: irisch

customer_reviews.title: PRICE GOUGING IN EFFECT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera on 4/23/2019 for a TOTAL of $45.07. Great camera but just be aware of the PRICE GOUGING the retailers are doing during this crisis !! YEKS auto be a law against that !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly as Expected in Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as expected in Windows 10 without installing any Logitech drivers or software. You can then download and install the free Microsoft Store "Camera" app if you like to record video or take pictures. The built-in Windows 10 drivers will automatically be recognized by any of your applications that allow a video camera or a microphone as input.
customer_reviews.author: stevefoobar

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This took FOREVER to come after ordering it and paying way too much, but everything else was sold out for weeks due to the COVID work-from-home crunch-- the webcam in our laptop crapped the bed a while ago, and the school Chromebooks don't have the juice to handle Zoom. It stays on my computer monitor very well, and the picture is great. We use a separate mic for Zoom and such, but this camera does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Mom

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to attach
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is okay, not great. The most difficult part is to get this stupid camera attached to your laptop. No matter what I tried, it just doesn't hold. Sometimes it falls off when I am in a middle of live session. For god sake, please improve the camera and make it hold to the laptop and/or send instructions in the package on how to to get it attached to customer's device
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Paul

customer_reviews.title: good it works
customer_reviews.text: Web camera, good it works, but I should of spent a little more and gotten a higher quality camera. it is 720p, but it only runs at 15fps which is why it's quality is so static? It's fine for Skype calls or if just gonna use a little camera while streaming, but for vlogging or anything of that nature, get something better. I decided to try to use it as a mirror for doing my make up in, and the lack of quality and low frame rate makes judgement hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars. Bought it used, now I regret doing that
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a bit ago, and only used to it for the camera itself. Always disabled the microphone considering I have a better one. The picture quality was good for the price, but just last week my good mic decided it had reached it's ending point. I create videos on youtube of reviews, game hacking tutorials with a range of financial trading tutorials to memes. Hope wasn't lost.. Until I decided to test out ht webcam mic and found out it didn't work WHAT SO EVER. Really hoping I can get a refund or replacement, considering Amazon marked it as "Good" quality with only COSMETIC errors.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WEBCAM FOR $20 USD. Has some troubles with Windows 10 (2018) But EASILY fixed.
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY good mouse for only $20 USD! I did have some troubles with this with Windows 10 (2018). My problem was nothing on my PC was recognizing the webcam and it wasn’t even being powered. What to do for this it to go into settings, Camera & Microphone, and then simply select and allow EVERYTHING. From then the Webcam should work if you did it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Light Can Stay On After Recording.
customer_reviews.text: This webcam has a tendency to remain on after it is done being used on Skype. This seems to be a known issue that Logitech doesn't have an interest in correcting as they seem to blame third-party applications, but I have used it on five different systems that are newly reinstalled, and it remains on for EVERY system when paired with either Google Hangouts or Skype. Not all of these seem to have the issue, but if you look around online you see a lot of people running into this issue with the device. Cannot find a way to refresh the firmware of the device to fix the issue and am therefore replacing the item.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel P

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Most computers have these built in but consider the quality you get with this device. Software to help configure, and easy set up. You don't even need to put a post it note over this one, just move it down. Using for Facebook live, Zoom Meetings, GoTo Meetings and even recording videos for over a year, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent webcam for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great WebCam for the price. The picture is very sharp and the microphone does a great job. The setup was very simple and easy. The only reason I am giving this a 4 star rather than a 5 star is the camera itself cannot zoom out far and it does not come with any video recording software. I have the WebCam sitting on my monitor on my desk and when I activate the WebCam it just shows my head. I was hoping it would show more of my upper torso.
customer_reviews.author: vtfirefighter32

customer_reviews.title: Works with Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to monitor my 3d printer jobs. This works natively with OctoPrint, a very popular 3d printer software suite. It is truly plug and play. The camera picture is very good quality for the price. I did have to mount a light above the enclosure to ensure the camera picture was consistent throughout the day. 5/5 - This is a great camera and very competitive price
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear picture. Used for conference calls and they thought I had a very expensive camera. When their $500 camera went off line and also had problems with the software my worked great and the software found it right off.
customer_reviews.author: Stan from Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Arrived super early!
customer_reviews.text: I picked free shipping because I didn't want to pay more money, so I wasn't expecting the web cam for another 5 to 10 days (counting the weekends). It arrived 2 days after I ordered it. As for the cam itself: The materials it's made from doesn't feel like cheap plastic. The cam takes a good picture. No idea about the mic quality as I cut it off because of my headset's mic. As of this review, I'd give the web cam a solid B overall. Depending on how long it lasts will determine if it moves up to an A or down to a F.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Hard time focusing up close
customer_reviews.text: I use this to monitor my 3d printer remotely, and while it does the job it essentially refuses to focus properly on anything within a foot of the lens. It still serves its purpose, but its a bit annoying having the wall behind my printer in focus whereas the print itself is a bit fuzzy
customer_reviews.author: Sukairain

customer_reviews.title: Why is it not easy to hold in place
customer_reviews.text: This product does not clip onto my external monitor, so I have to literally tape it with scotch tape. Why is it not easy to hold in place? What am I missing? Further, I have the usb installed in my laptop and my camera rested on top of my external monitor (that does not have a web cam which is why I purchased it), after 5 minutes or so, it goes in and out of a clear picture, duplicates the image, then normalizes. I can't figure out why it keeps doing this. A complete waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mac Mini with Vizio TV for screen
customer_reviews.text: I worried this wouldn't work for a Mac because the product description says the driver software is only PC compatible. But you don't need that software for any reason. For setup info, I bought a Mac Mini and use a Vizio TV as a screen in an office/kids' media room. But we couldn't use Skype without a camera, so I researched and bought this one. Plugged it in, downloaded/installed/opened Skype, and it immediately recognized the camera and the built-in microphone. Picture quality is excellent on the 39" flat screen. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Megonotron

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in December of 2017 and it worked very well for a few months. It's now May of 2018 and it has completely stopped working. It no longer is picked up by anything on my main computer or my 2 other computers. I would've recommended it, if it worked for more than 5 months. And trying to contact Logitech Support is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: tayler snow

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple of months and then started causing blue screen errors
customer_reviews.text: I was ok with this webcam for a while, it did what it needed to do, however all of sudden after a couple of months, it started causing blue screen crash errors on Windows and I can't even have it near my computer now. I will be switching to something else soon as I need this to work consistently due to having a full time work from home job.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture - horrible mount
customer_reviews.text: The camera produces a really good picture for its resolution... the mount is terrible. The mount won't hold the camera even on most monitor top edges against the pull of the cable... it relies only on gravity to keep it mounted and it doesn't weigh much... With today's super thin displays... this type of mount is pretty much obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: NOLAexpat

customer_reviews.title: A decent camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera, and provides the quality image stated with ease. I wish I had spent a little bit more money to get the 1080 quality one, but I've been overall pretty satisfied with this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Basic camera for everyday needs
customer_reviews.text: It’s a basic camera. It has a hard time focusing when holding up documents close to it. Image comes out very blurry when you bring something right up to the lens. Unfortunately this is really inconvenient for me for what I use it for. I usually just switch to my default camera when I need it to focus. It does have a really long cord which is nice when moving around. It also comes with a stand that works well when putting on top of my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awful Software, Awful Support
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the C310 drivers/software directly from Logitech. Immediately after installing the Logitech provided software does not work. The camera doesn't zoom or pan like it is supposed to. Contacted customer support weeks ago, no response. The Logitech customer support forums are filled with unaswered and unacknowledged questions.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup not the best picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Setup is very easy. Pretty much plug and play on imac. Picture quality is okay not the best quality. Image quality is worse compare to other with 4k web cam in zoom. I expected that when I purchased it though. Pretty happy with the purchase. Recommend if you are on tight budget. If you have more money to spend look into the 1080 or 4k ones
customer_reviews.author: Trani

customer_reviews.title: This cam was awesome. A fantastic bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This cam was awesome. A fantastic bang for your buck; except when it spontaneously stops working. I use this for YouTube and streaming on twitch, and both the quality and frames are great, but those only matter when the camera is working. At some points, the camera will freeze on a frame and stay there. The mic still works (I use it because it has a fantastic quality mic), but the camera just decides to not record. I've had this video issue in two reputable programs, OBS Studio and NVIDIA GeForce Experience, so I know it isn't softwares clashing. I wish this was still working.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker MacLellan

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I used this 4 times & the audio no longer works. I can be seen, but not heart. I have tried uninstalling the drivers, reinstalling; I have tried it on another computer... it no longer works. If I'd known it would be useless within 6 months I would not have bothered. My Review in March (5 stars): Works wonderfully. Exactly what I was looking for to participate in video conferences.
customer_reviews.author: CTMom

customer_reviews.title: Works. Not amazing video quality, but good enough
customer_reviews.text: Working very well. Windows 10, didn't have to install anything. Not amazing quality, but good enough for basic video chats. Microphone works from several feet away. I wish it had a wider angle lens, but I know you'd have to pay more for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lazarus Dark

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera does not auto focus for things close up. Anything you hold up to the camera will be blurry. I have used this camera for a year now. I use it to teach online courses and it has functioned perfectly. I love it, and it loves me. It doesn’t sit very tightly on top of your monitor, but as long as you aren’t regularly bumping into your monitor this isn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Audio and video are great, camera mounting and angle adjustment leave some to be desired
customer_reviews.text: NO left/right adjustment, so monitor has to be facing you perfectly. Also, attachment arm is kind of awkward but I've got it sitting just right. Audio and video quality are very good and the view is wide (wider than I'd like really). For a budget webcam it performs well, the biggest frustration was zero side to side movement so I had to change my monitor setup so the cam is properly aimed at me for business calls.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyStrongMd

customer_reviews.title: It's a good Webcam
customer_reviews.text: 1. I'm a Logitech fan... I get a lot of products from Logitech and very seldom have problems with them. 2. This is my first webcam so I don't have anything to compare it to. 3. I purchased this for Skyping purposes and it is working as intended. The sound quality and picture quality is very good according to the other people I Skype but I have not used it to make a video so I cannot comment on that process of at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Paoletti

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for someone so we could cam on skype together. Works great. Doesn't require any CDs for installation, just plug it in and it's hassle free. It is, however, not that stable. Basically, the cam is adjusted on a clip. You stick the clip on the laptop or something. If the person is typing a lot, you may hear the clip constantly hit against the laptop or move. Not sure if there's a way to fix that, but that's the only complaint I have with the product. I still recommend this product regardless of that minor flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, high quality, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This little cheap webcam is what you are looking for. Quality is fantastic, mic is more than passable and the USB cord is probably long enough for what you need. Stability wise it perches well enough if you don't shake the monitor or pull the cord. I would mainly recommend this for 1 or 3 monitor setups as two monitor setups are typically angled inwards meaning the webcam will not be square on the user however I have two monitors and have found a way to use the cam happily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Best HD Webcam and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these through our company account for use in our office and the time came that I needed one for my house. These cameras are great and provide high-quality video and audio and are perfectly compatible with Skype. I highly recommend this over the more expensive options. Unless you need more advanced features or are looking for 1080 resolution, go with this camera. Even if you spend twice as a much on a full HD camera, there is no guarantee that our computer, internet and the other variables will actually allow you to send full HD video to the other party anyhow. Don't waste money on the more expensive models--this one works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Grossmann

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the picture quality, works well with Twitch
customer_reviews.text: I have surprisingly few quibbles about this webcam. I'd purchased it for the purpose of streaming games on Twitch TV and was pretty impressed at how clear the picture is and how vibrant the colors look. Of course, this is my first webcam since 2006, but at the same time, I'm a professional photographer and don't compliment lightly. It secures pretty well to the top of your monitor (I used some double sided tape) and the angling seemed smooth, yet sturdy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing webcam for the price. Crisp, clear picture (we use it for streaming live online and many other cams fail, believe it or not.) Also, the built-in microphone picks up voice well and cancels out a lot, if not all, of the background noise. Sounds very similar to an external mic setup. The one drawback of this cam is that it does not swivel left to right at the base -- your left/right range is limited to the angle the lens itself can achieve. Plug and play functionality with easy to use software. Seamless integration with streaming platforms like OBS.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera will need additional 2.0 usb line and driver
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for price I will say for myself at least it wasn’t plug and play we did have To go to website to install a driver also after reading reviews I added an additional usb male female attachment about 15 feet was smallest I could find also make sure if you buy additional usb that it’s size 2.0. Up running ❤️❤️❤️It!
customer_reviews.author: PilatesMommy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it very often but it's a great addition to my workspace at home. The picture and sound quality are wonderful. It's very easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda S

customer_reviews.title: A great webcam for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitec HD Webcam C310 worked great. I downloaded the drivers and when I was using it on Windows 7 Home Edition it had really fantastic picture quality and resolution. Better than any of the previous web cams I have owned, and the make and design makes it far easier to handle and mount than the old round cams. I have since gotten a new HP all in one computer using Windows 8.1 and at this time have not tried the web cam on it. I will be doing this soon and I'm sure it will work fine. I have never had any problems with Logitech products and have used a Logitech wireless mouse for years.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Need to download the Logitech Software
customer_reviews.text: The webcam itself gets 4 stars because the contents did not come with a software manual. I thought I had a defective item. I plugged it in my laptop and the LED light did not come on. I thought my laptop would recognize it like it does any other usb device such as a phone charger. I had to search on ‘Google’ to read reviews that a software came with their original purchase from the manufacturer, not like this Amazon Vendor. Everything with the device is fine , well except the ‘auto-zoom’ quality which is annoying , I need to figure how to remove it. Next time please inform buyers about the Logitech Software prior to purchase thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a big need for a camera at our PC. For what we do, this was perfect. Easy install, easy mount, good picture & sound, and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: John Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product! I use it for work. Used it daily for months. Dropped it several times and nothing happened. I just wish the picture quality was better. It's not bad (actually pretty good for most distances), but it doesn't adjust for depth. Anything close-up looks out of focus. For the price, that's totally fine. But it's good to know what you're getting. I use it to teach VIPKid and I would recommend it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J

customer_reviews.title: I tried to go to the Logitech website and their support is complete garbage. They just put your around
customer_reviews.text: This camera doesn't work with Microsoft Lync no matter what I did. I can't use it. I downloaded all the software from the Logitech site and followed all the steps. I tried to go to the Logitech website and their support is complete garbage. They just put your around, click here, go there and as a result, they redirect you to the first page, merry go around. No human being, no chat. I just lost my money. I can't even return it to Amazon because I already opened the package. Waste of time and money. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Needed for college
customer_reviews.text: The quality is what the instructor requested and there were no complaints. If I was to use this for streaming such as twitch I would go with a higher quality picture, if this is just for meetings and chatting with friends this would work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jareth

customer_reviews.title: It would very easily come off if moved the wrong way
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem I have with this webcam is that it doesn't really fit on my monitor. It would very easily come off if moved the wrong way, it's really a very poor design. So far does not cut out background noise very well either. The picture is decent. Very minimal movement, which makes it difficult when my husband and I try to skype his family. Really only useful if it's just one person using it. Wish I had spent the extra money for a better webcam but this one works fine for now since all it's used for is skype
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Unit works Good, But NO SUPPORT from Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Very vague instructions and no support from Logitech. Finally got it to work, but when you buy this, do not expect any help, support, or assistance from Logitech! Would have had 5 stars but the NO-SUPPORT from Logitech issue is important.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD E.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give bad review, but works as advertised. I made mistake of not reading details about video capture and motion detection, which it does not have, but have to admit my bad not theirs and was not a must have. So I have kept it and it works great for video conferences and Skype.
customer_reviews.author: digger

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this webcam, I use it for streaming and the picture quality is ok for the price, just make sure you have a good lighting setup if you plan on using this for streaming otherwise the picture will look like grainy
customer_reviews.author: jon watson

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better camera this one doesn't cut it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is decent for the price. I wouldn't recommend it if you really want a nice crisp picture, but if you just want a decent upgrade from a crappy built in camera its definitely an improvement. The con: terrible contrast, the camera simply can't auto adjust to the correct brightness and contrast, it's either too white washed or too dark. The pro: it works
customer_reviews.author: Ariel D.

customer_reviews.title: Now using for OVER 7 YEARS!!! And STILL going Strong??? Logitech gets my Webcam business...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for OVER 7 YEARS!!! Didn't even realize it until today. Logitech gets my Webcam business for life. I use this camera everyday and didn't even realize I purchased it over 7 YEARS AGO! One of the best purchases I ever made here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Harry's - Product Video Reviews in HD. With "Baffles Me" Box Openings and Auctions for Charity. Like what you see? Please FOLLOW ME!

customer_reviews.title: great buy, I was struggling with a really old ...
customer_reviews.text: great buy, I was struggling with a really old webcam giving a fuzzy picture on windows 10, then I got this, WOW what a difference, the picture is crisp and clear to my family in the UK and the sound is the same, great buy, wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David Green

customer_reviews.title: Welp, Darn...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use in brick-filming. I tested it ought a couple times and then put in it a box. Unfortunately life came around, and I wasn't able to go through with my plans. When I got it ought again I found out that the lens had become blurry. From reading the reviews I see I wasn't the only one. I would ask for a warranty replacement, but the warranty has expired. Note: If some form of technical support can fix this product my rating would change.
customer_reviews.author: the brannon family

customer_reviews.title: Good images for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a competent webcam. Nothing special, but it delivers crisp performance at VGA resolutions. I have 10 units running on 10 different computers, and all have functioned flawlessly for over a year and without needing special drivers (critical in my secure environment). Minor quibbles: (1) The USB cord is a tad short (about 3'). (2) The so-called monitor clip is friction-based, with no springs. So it easily falls off the top of the monitor if someone jostles it. (3) Fixed-focus limits close-up focusing -- anything less than about 15 inches from the lens is blurry.
customer_reviews.author: R. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend you turn elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. We've repeatedly struggled with sounding like a "chipmunk" from the mic on this. I've read many places that others deal with this. Though I've spent hours trying to remedy this matter, I've never been able to fix it. Apparently many do not have this issue, bust is it worth it. It's a shame that Logitech has such a big corner on the market, since I do not care to ever buy another of their products. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Isom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WEBCAM
customer_reviews.text: THE WEBCAM IS A GREAT DEAL, I WAS TOLD THE PICTURE IS VERY GOOD AND THE AUDIO IS OUTSTANDING. ONLY ONE THING I CAN SAY IS THE PICTURE WIDTH IS JUST A LITTLE BIT NARROW. WITH THAT SAID, IT IS A GREAT CAM & A GREAT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: R. Maher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Webcam
customer_reviews.text: This webcam is really awesome for a non-professional product. Granted, it's predecessor was seriously going out of the window, so not a high bar there, but we love this thing. It let us get on Skype calls with family and allow them to see us! Not blobs of color! Image is crisp, clear, and the product is easy to use. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Cline

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for business conference calls.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to use and connect. Windows finds it automatically and sets it up and the applications can use it right away. Not very many options but for basic video conferences and the like it works great. The microphone on it is mediocre and if you want to ensure you don't have any issues with feedback or garbled or other audio related stuff then I suggest a better microphone but for most uses this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: It's the best webcam for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to plug and play. No set up required, it just sees you and hears you when your using skype or other video call software. Very flexible in it's mounting capabilities with all sorts of monitors, desks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Performs As Promised
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have used several Logitech products and I have never been disappointed. This webcam is no exception. I use it for a minimum of three, and sometimes as many as seven, scheduled Blab live-stream events, several Zoom classroom sessions weekly, and numerous client engagements by Zoom and Skype. All in all it performs to my expectations. I was blown away by its small size and light weight, making it convenient to use as well as portable if necessary. Works for me! -- Rev. Stephen B. Henry, PhD. - The WordPress Wizard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Henry

customer_reviews.title: Reliable camera at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a blind person who uses Skype. That's the reason for the camera. I actually bought it for my girlfriend so she gets to see me . The sound is real good with the microphone and the picture is apparently very good as well. I've had and have several Logitech products and haven't ever been disappointed. This is another of those products. Good camera for a pretty good price. It's also very reliable as I haven't ever had a problem in the two plus years I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: I bought this camera from Amazon, but received a fake - not Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera where Amazon was the seller, and surprisingly I received a fake version. The logo on the camera says Logi as opposed to Logitech and the laptop recognized it as a "USB Camera" while a real Logitech camera I purchased later is recognized as a "Logitech camera". The quality of the camera is poor. Focus is bad, but what can you expect from a fake one. Also I realized this after the return window has expired, soo we will have to see if I still can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: zoom

customer_reviews.title: Is the government watching???
customer_reviews.text: Works great, unlike many other webcams I've used. So far, to my knowledge, the government hasn't taken control and watched (what I presume) would be an incredibly boring show. But then again, I don't think I would know about it if the government was watching... Hmm... Quite the paradox. Anyway, no, I'm no nut, and I don't believe in government conspiracy theories. Rather, I believe in quality equipment that works well, and this happens to be one of those pieces of equipment. Would highly recommend it, although, if you're afraid of the government watching, you probably shouldn't be on your computer in the first place. Move to the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off
customer_reviews.text: This is not a true Logitech product. The the name spelling and lack of copyright logo, including coloring, indicate this is a knock-off product. Have not used this product, but am leery of it's quality relative to a true Logitech product and brand integrity.
customer_reviews.author: milgrade

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good to very good
customer_reviews.text: I use it primarily to Skype with my daughter in the UK. She is particularly impressed with the ability of the camera to automatically follow face motion and adjust viewing angle (zoom in and out). Sound quality is good to very good. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable 720 HD Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this webcam in 2014. Lately, I've been using it about 5 days a week. It's never failed to deliver good color and resolution. It is much better than the webcams that come with typical laptops.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great as replacement Camera
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the webcam on my computer stopped working I purchased this as a replacement and it has worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: pkscomix

customer_reviews.title: ... online tutoring and this was the camera that was recommended. I'm so thankful to have made this very ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera to do online tutoring and this was the camera that was recommended. I'm so thankful to have made this very affordable purchase because it's exactly what I needed and has not failed me yet in the 3 months I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Yaay. Works in Linux.
customer_reviews.text: I run linux (Ubuntu) on my computer, and had to get set up for a video conference call quickly. This worked perfect, out of the box. No issues. Picture and sound. Great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gozzard

customer_reviews.title: Like the camera but don't like that it was used and have scratches
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the camera, I have another Logitech HD camera on another PC and both work great. The one thing that I don't like that I got mine used with scratches and can't return it for free. The label on the package says new but I can see few scratches on the body and also on the usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Works on my Mac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a web conference where I had to have a web cam. Seemed inexpensive enough. Works out of the box on my Mac for that, no download needed. Work on Skype type calls. Microphone is great. Better than on my old headset. Picture Quality is ok. Serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Vine member

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality and mic are great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price!!! Simple to install and use. Picture quality and microphone great quality. I use it on a desk top, so mounting is super easy with strong, steady hold. Read other reviews struggling to mount on laptops; desk tops no problem though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Victoria McWoodson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a great price. Much better than my regular laptop camera, definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hancock

customer_reviews.title: lil over 6 months old and already messes up
customer_reviews.text: I very seldom use this cam. which shocks me as to why it goes black when I use it.It worked fine this morning but this evening bam its done for.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cossmos

customer_reviews.title: Great Webcam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work so everyone can see my whole team during our conference calls. Works great, plug and play. Works great with WebEx and Skype !
customer_reviews.author: Jude R Shellito

customer_reviews.title: Good Price--Decent Performance--I bought it as a "Refurbished" item -- No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my camera "REFURBISHED" -- my order was promptly fulfilled by "TMall" (abt $25-free shiupping). Installation was easy-no problems. The camera's "SKYPE" setup was almost automatic. I would have given it 5 Stars accept for the fact that the "Color" it produces is not quite "true", when using inside lighting conditions. I have not used it with outdoor lighting. I have not used it's built in microphone, so I cannot extend any comment about the audio quality. It does produce good detail and has decent sensitivity and minimal grain. For $25 I feel it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Quality picture, versatile
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive usb camera with a good software program available with "auto detect". Good for home security .. as long as the thieves dont steal your computer! Also, its hand to plug into a laptop and take videos outside of the house.
customer_reviews.author: olde english

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Webcam
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and reliable little guy. When it is in use, a little green light comes on. It is nice to have that, so you know exactly when it is 'in use' or not. It has a little adjustable plastic stand on the back of it, and it will balance well on top of a monitor. I have not had any problems with it yet!
customer_reviews.author: IMAHAPPYFATLARD

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but likes to drift upward
customer_reviews.text: this camera has been VERY faithful to me, strong with solid clarity and a VERY reactive microphone... a bit *too* reactive actually. i could hear the dog barking from 4 houses down in my tests (NOT A BAD THING!!! Just means i need to make sure there's a good noise cancellation set up on it from in the settings.) The only thing that irks me about this camera is that it constantly slides upward due to the cable tugging on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dotterer

customer_reviews.title: Its Basic
customer_reviews.text: If you try to hang this on your laptop monitor it points too far down, and I assume its the same on a flat screen monitor. I use it with Skype, TinyChat.com, and Google Hangouts-- there hasn't been any compatability issues. MAKE SURE YOU GET THE DRIVERS!!!  There are only basic "advanced options." I'd suggest maybe ManyCam.com or another third party program for filters and screen sharing. The webcam's picture isn't as clear as I would have liked, but its not bad by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I hardly review anything but I'm so pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I hardly review anything but I'm so pleased with this camera. My phone camera is great but it's hard to position when making videos and going live for my business. The quality is great and I love that it sits on top of my laptop so easily. Very happy with this purchase! So inexpensive, too!
customer_reviews.author: Roni Yonka

customer_reviews.title: Driver LVRS64.sys causes system crashes on Windows 10 64bit systems
customer_reviews.text: When working the product rates a 5 for how it works for the price. But, the driver with the system causes GSOD system crashes at random, almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kimper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great camera high density clear picture, the best camera I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Z

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality on my built-in camera on my Mac is much better. I just bought this to use with an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just OK quality. The picture quality on my built-in camera on my Mac is much better. I just bought this to use with an external monitor. Does its job, but if you're looking for something to give you better picture quality, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Though it doesn't have all the "bells and whistles" (like zooming, special affects, blah blah blah), it does have an excellent mic (so I could get rid of the stand-alone mic) enabling me to be super-clearly heard without having to lean toward it. And, the lens doesn't require focusing, so being close or further away are both in focus. It was very easy to install, no configuring at all. Well worth the money. I previously had the Lifecam VX-3000 which required focusing for how far I was from the cam, and the mic couldn't hear me well so I had to use a stand-alone one up close. A great value and the perfect unit for Google Hangout, Skype, and such.
customer_reviews.author: lark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and performance and is comparable to the higher cost units. I use this on a Lab back up system and my experience is comparable to those in my office high end system. Strongly recommend even for a prime site. Great price as well. Also W10 finally works with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terrence McGartyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The video quality is pretty nice, but the overall design isn't mind blowing
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is pretty nice, but the overall design isn't mind blowing. I'm a little bothered by the front plate being loose and flimsy, but it's not like that interferes with anything. It's just a quality thing. It does it's job. Good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Regular human male

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking to do anything more than Skype calls, spend the extra 10 or 20 bucks on a better camera.
customer_reviews.text: It is not ideal for content creation if you're looking to become a Youtube Creator or Streamer, as it can ONLY convert to 16:9 in its native Logitech software (Why?). It also took quite a bit of fidgeting with the settings to get a smooth 720p60fps. The default settings do NOT provide that quality whatsoever. It just barely clings onto the monitor and does not autofocus...the zoom in quality is horrendous. It's really just a subpar product, BUT I can't say it doesn't do what it says it does, so it gets 2 stars. I'm just disappointed :(.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi L.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, had no trouble with it connecting to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, had no trouble with it connecting to my computer and works with every app that I have tried with. I'm very happy with both the video quality and sound quality, it's not perfect but it does the trick. EDIT: I just want it to update this review to let you guys know that this camera worked perfectly with my raspberry pie with octoprint as an OS, plug and play and record those timelapse videos.
customer_reviews.author: Olaso

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I just don't see the image quality. I was hoping it'd be a step up from the poor quality camera that came standard on my Lenovo G580, and it's more like half a step up for me. I was disappointed because I needed something that balanced quality and affordability for an experiment in my psych lab, which is set up on another computer (not my laptop). So two computers so far have displayed a poor quality image. For the price I was not expecting stunning, crystal clear HD, but I feel as though it belongs in the low def category.
customer_reviews.author: M. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product details says it is a wireless network camera. It is not at all. Also you can pick up this same camera for retail from Bestbuy for $21. total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Linux Debian 8.3 Microphone Boost Issues, Much Sad
customer_reviews.text: I had serious microphone issues out of the box under Linux Debian 8.3, XFCE. I'm on a linux friendly Asus MB, everything was plug and play, it's just the microphone level would. not. boost. I tried every single audio package from the stable repos, and just couldn't overcome the issue. I was too lazy to compile some oddball forum solutions, and instead purchased the older brother Logitech 920 model and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Cheap
customer_reviews.text: In this sudden era of Zoom meetings, boy am I glad I bought this. Installation was a snap and the picture is great. And for that price? A no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: nickybaseball

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK IN WINDOWS 10
customer_reviews.text: Logitech doesn't care that the product doesn't work with Windows 10. It is easier for them to force you to have to buy a newer one. That is terrible support! Not going to buy another item from Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: corwinteach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all purpose webcam. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Plugged it in, I didn't need to install any drivers (unless Windows did it for me, I have Windows 8.1). Relatively small and low profile, has a lengthy cable, and video quality is great for the price (bought it for ~$25). Microphone is meh. Cons: Framerate for live video was only 14FPS, I haven't tried recording video but the live stream FPS was kind of lacking. Works well enough for Twitch though. Overall: 9/10 For the price you can't beat it. But if you NEED the higher framerate or higher resolution camera, I recommend upgrading. Works for almost any purpose though. If you are getting it for the mic, forget it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not super technical--but a millenial :)
customer_reviews.text: I admit--I'm not super technically inclined, but I'm fairly young (26) so fairly familiar with the basic ins and outs of how things like this work. That being said--it's SUPER easy. I plugged it in and downloaded Skype, including those two steps, I was up and running in under 10 minutes. The picture is good, and according to the folks on the other end, the sound is good too. I was a little concerned about how well it would stay sitting on the top of my laptop screen--and it settles in and stays without any trouble at all. I also like how small and compact it is. All in all, I think it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Was plug-and-play with Linux Mint 18 without ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Was plug-and-play with Linux Mint 18 without any issues. Decent resolution, color, and audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

product_meta.title: Logitech HD Webcam C310, Standard Packaging - Black
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLogitech HD Webcam C310 with 720p Video, 5 MP Photos System Requirements: Windows 10 or later Windows 8 Windows 7|macOS 10.10 or laterChrome OSAndroid v 5.0 or above|USB portInternet accessVisit your preferred video calling solution provider's website for exact information on system and performance requirements.|Visit your preferred video calling solution provider's website for exact information on system and performance requirements.|Works with Skype - Google Hangouts - FaceTime for Mac

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


FEATURES
 Say it bigger. Say it better. High definition video up to 720p, a wide-angle lens and autofocus for picture quality that's simply amazing. Video chat, blog, stream and upload to Facebook in just one click. The term 'webcam' doesn't quite do it justice. Logitech Fluid Crystal Technology gives you smooth, fluid video. Crystal clear images. Rich colors. 





Simple video calling in fluid HD 720p
 * The smoothest HD video calls with more video frames per second than other HD webcams
 * Free, easy HD calls on included Logitech Vid HD or your preferred IM service


Learn more


Snap and share crisp, clear pics
Send family and friends high-quality digital photos, software enhanced up to 5-megapixels. 


Look just right even in bad light
Logitech RightLight2 technology corrects for poor lighting, so family and friends see you clearly—even in dim light or shadowy backlight. 

Upload HD videos to Facebook in one click
 * Record HD 720p videos, then launch them to Facebook or YouTube in one quick click


Learn more

Flat-out versatile
 * Universal clip attaches the webcam securely to your laptop or LCD monitor
 * Sleek flat-panel design looks great with any setup




Sound good even in a noisy room
Friends hear you clearly with a noise-cancelling mic, positioned on the front of the camera for best voice pickup. 
COMPATIBILITY 



Package contents
 * Webcam with 5-foot cable
 * User documentation
 * 2-year limited hardware warranty


Works with
supports Windows Vista, Windows 7 (32-bit or 64-bit) or Windows 8 

Basic requirements:
 * 1 GHz
 * 512 MB RAM or more
 * 200 MB hard drive space
 * Internet connection
 * USB 1.1 port (2.0 recommended)


For HD 720p video calling and recording on Logitech Vid HD:
 * 2.4 Intel GHz Core 2 Duo
 * 2 GB RAM
 * 200 MB hard drive space
 * USB 2.0 port
 * 1 Mbps upload speed or higher
 * 1280 X 720 screen resolution

COMPARE 




Which Logitech HD Webcam is right for you?

*40 cm and beyond
